comments:
I'm reporting these exceptions on the offchance that it might be useful to you 
guys.

I don't know precisely what caused, it though:

In the last couple of minutes I've been comparing two projects with eachother, 
one under CVS, the other a local project that I imported.


?yvind

a JDT Text issue.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 22242 ***
